publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4973 Mr Brian Monteith: Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds—That the Parliament commends Ordnance Survey (OS) and its "Free Maps for 11-year-olds" programme which offers a free OS Explorer map to every Scottish pupil in Primary 7 through their school, simply by registering online, and notes that this raises awareness of local geography and encourages further inquiry and learning, while introducing many aspects of citizenship, and also builds on the programme’s past success in issuing over 60,000 maps to eligible schools in 2005.
S2M-4973 Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds (lodged on 18 October 2006) Bruce Crawford*, John Swinburne*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4973 Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds (lodged on 18 October 2006) Robin Harper*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4973 Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds (lodged on 18 October 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4973 Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds (lodged on 18 October 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4973 Free Maps for 11-Year-Olds (lodged on 18 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
